home

waoh! explosions!

hello and welcome to my website! :^]

this flammable spot hosts all sorts of things, including:

  • wikipages about my ocs
  • computer stuff like sitebuilding notes and twine games
  • excellent links
  • and more!1

please find the navigation conveniently located at the top and bottom of each page üòå

have a burg from super smash bros brawl and an elegant stay!

bonus notes

  • this site works best on desktop (tested on firefox) but also supports narrow screens/mobile üòé
  • things are always under construction (especially the wiki), so if you find any broken images or links please let me know!
